name: Quick Methi Malai Tofu-Paneer Mutter
description: Easy Methi Malai Paneer with fenugreek, cashew cream and Tofu. Vegan Gluten-free Indian Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon garam masala ((or cumin, coriander, cinnamon, clove powders))
1 cup thin cashew cream ((soy milk or full fat coconut milk))

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan on medium heat, add butter and onions and garam masala and cook till onions are golden.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan on medium heat, add butter and onions and garam masala and cook till onions are golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the ginger garlic paste and cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the ginger garlic paste and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend cashews with a few tbsp milk into a coarse paste. Add paste to the pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend cashews with a few tbsp milk into a coarse paste. Add paste to the pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the salt, sugar and fenugreek leaves and mix well. Cook for 4-5 minutes on medium-low until the paste starts to thicken.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the salt, sugar and fenugreek leaves and mix well. Cook for 4-5 minutes on medium-low until the paste starts to thicken.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the peas, cashew cream/coconut milk, grated tofu and mix well. Taste for salt and sugar and adjust. Cook covered for another 2-3 minutes to bring the milk to a boil. Cook without cover if you like a thicker curry. Sprinkle chili flakes or black pepper for some spice.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the peas, cashew cream/coconut milk, grated tofu and mix well. Taste for salt and sugar and adjust. Cook covered for another 2-3 minutes to bring the milk to a boil. Cook without cover if you like a thicker curry. Sprinkle chili flakes or black pepper for some spice.

recipeInstructions.text: The recipe is very flexible, you can adjust the quantities of cashews and other things depending on your preferences for creamier, cheesier, richer, spicier versions.
recipeInstructions.name: The recipe is very flexible, you can adjust the quantities of cashews and other things depending on your preferences for creamier, cheesier, richer, spicier versions.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot with Garlic Naan or Rotis!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot with Garlic Naan or Rotis!
